1772                        default <U> RequiredPropertyGetter<U> map(
1773                                        PropertyFunction<? super T, ? extends U, ? super Exception> mapper) {
1774                                return new RequiredFuncGetter<T, U>(this, mapper, null);
1775                        }
1776
1777                        /**
1778                         * Creates a Property from the given key and this getter.
1779                         * @param key key.
1780                         * @return property.
1781                         * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the key is malformed.
1782                         */
1783                        default RequiredProperty<T> build(String key) throws IllegalArgumentException {
1784                                validateKey(key);
1785                                return new DefaultRequiredProperty<>(this, List.of(key));
1786                        }
1787
1788                        /**
1789                         * Creates a Property from the given key and its {@value LogProperties#NAME}
1790                         * parameter.
1791                         * @param key key.
1792                         * @param name interpolates <code>{name}</code> in property name with this
1793                         * value.
1794                         * @return property.
1795                         */
1796                        default RequiredProperty<T> buildWithName(String key, String name) {
1797                                var parameters = Map.of(NAME, name);
1798                                validateKeyParameters(key, parameters.keySet());
1799                                String fqn = LogProperties.interpolateKey(key, parameters);
1800                                return build(fqn);
1801                        }
1802
1803                }
1804
1805        }
1806
1807}
1808
1809abstract class AbstractLogPropertiesBuilder<T> {
1810
1811        protected abstract T self();
1812
1813}
1814
1815record DefaultProperty<T>(PropertyGetter<T> propertyGetter, List<String> keys) implements LogProperties.Property<T> {
1816
1817        public DefaultProperty {
1818                Objects.requireNonNull(propertyGetter);
1819                if (keys.isEmpty()) {
1820                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("should have at least one key");
1821                }
1822        }
1823
1824        /**
1825         * Gets the first key.
1826         * @return key.
1827         */
1828        public String key() {
1829                return keys.get(0);
1830        }
1831
1832        @Override
1833        public Result<T> get(LogProperties properties) {
1834                return propertyGetter.get(properties, keys);
1835        }
1836
1837        public <U> LogProperties.Property<U> map(PropertyFunction<? super T, ? extends U, ? super Exception> mapper) {
1838                return new DefaultProperty<>(propertyGetter.map(mapper), keys);
1839        }
1840
1841        public String propertyString(T value) {
1842                return propertyGetter.propertyString(value);
1843        }
1844
1845        public void set(T value, BiConsumer<String, T> consumer) {
1846                if (value != null) {
1847                        consumer.accept(key(), value);
1848                }
1849        }
1850
1851}
1852
1853record DefaultRequiredProperty<T>(RequiredPropertyGetter<T> propertyGetter,
1854                List<String> keys) implements LogProperties.RequiredProperty<T> {
1855
1856        public DefaultRequiredProperty {
1857                Objects.requireNonNull(propertyGetter);
1858                if (keys.isEmpty()) {
1859                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("should have at least one key");
1860                }
1861        }
1862
1863        /**
1864         * Gets the first key.
1865         * @return key.
1866         */
1867        public String key() {
1868                return keys.get(0);
1869        }
1870
1871        @Override
1872        public RequiredResult<T> get(LogProperties properties) {
1873                return propertyGetter.get(properties, keys);
1874        }
1875
1876        public <U> LogProperties.RequiredProperty<U> map(
1877                        PropertyFunction<? super T, ? extends U, ? super Exception> mapper) {
1878                return new DefaultRequiredProperty<>(propertyGetter.map(mapper), keys);
1879        }
1880
1881        public String propertyString(T value) {
1882                return propertyGetter.propertyString(value);
1883        }
1884
1885        public void set(T value, BiConsumer<String, T> consumer) {
1886                if (value != null) {
1887                        consumer.accept(key(), value);
1888                }
1889        }
1890
1891}
1892
1893record MapProperties(String description, Map<String, String> map) implements LogProperties {
1894
1895        @Override
1896        public @Nullable String valueOrNull(String key) {
1897                return map.get(key);
1898        }
1899
1900        @Override
1901        public String description(String key) {
1902                return description + " (" + key + ")";
1903        }
1904
1905}
1906
1907record FallbackGetter<T>(PropertyGetter<T> parent,
1908                Supplier<? extends T> fallback) implements RequiredPropertyGetter<T> {
1909
1910        @Override
1911        public RequiredResult<T> get(LogProperties props, String key) {
1912                var r = parent.get(props, key);
1913                RequiredResult<T> req = switch (r) {
1914                        case Result.Missing<T> m -> {
1915                                var f = fallback.get();
1916                                if (f == null) {
1917                                        yield PropertyGetter.findRoot(parent) //
1918                                                .errorResult(props, key, new LogProperties.PropertyMissingException("fallback returned null"));
1919                                }
1920                                yield new Result.Success<>(f);
1921                        }
1922                        case Result.Success<T> s -> s;
1923                        case Result.Error<T> e -> e;
1924                };
1925                return req;
1926        }
1927
1928        @Override
1929        public String propertyString(T value) {
1930                return parent.propertyString(value);
1931        }
1932
1933}
1934
1935record MapGetter(RootPropertyGetter parent) implements ChildPropertyGetter<Map<String, String>> {
1936
1937        private @Nullable Map<String, String> valueOrNull(LogProperties props, String key) {
1938                return props.mapOrNull(parent.fullyQualifiedKey(key));
1939        }
1940
1941        @Override
1942        public Result<Map<String, String>> get(LogProperties props, String key) {
1943                var v = valueOrNull(props, key);
1944                if (v == null) {
1945                        return parent.missingResult(props, List.of(key));
1946                }
1947                return new Result.Success<>(v);
1948        }
1949
1950        @Override
1951        public String propertyString(Map<String, String> value) {
1952                return _propertyString(value);
1953        }
1954
1955        static String _propertyString(Map<?, ?> value) {
1956                StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
1957                boolean first = true;
1958                for (var e : value.entrySet()) {
1959                        if (first) {
1960                                first = true;
1961                        }
1962                        else {
1963                                sb.append("&");
1964                        }
1965                        PercentCodec.encode(sb, String.valueOf(e.getKey()), StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
1966                        Object v = e.getValue();
1967                        if (v != null) {
1968                                sb.append("=");
1969                                PercentCodec.encode(sb, String.valueOf(v), StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
1970                        }
1971                }
1972                return sb.toString();
1973        }
1974
1975}
1976
1977record ListGetter(RootPropertyGetter parent) implements ChildPropertyGetter<List<String>> {
1978
1979        @Override
1980        public Result<List<String>> get(LogProperties props, String key) {
1981                var list = props.listOrNull(key);
1982                if (list == null) {
1983                        return parent.missingResult(props, List.of(key));
1984                }
1985                return new Result.Success<>(list);
1986        }
1987
1988        public String propertyString(List<String> list) {
1989                return _propertyString(list);
1990        }
1991
1992        static String _propertyString(List<?> list) {
1993                StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
1994                boolean first = true;
1995                for (var e : list) {
1996                        if (first) {
1997                                first = true;
1998                        }
1999                        else {
2000                                sb.append(",");
2001                        }
2002                        PercentCodec.encode(sb, String.valueOf(e), StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
2003                }
2004                return sb.toString();
2005        }
2006
2007}
2008
2009record FuncGetter<T, R>(PropertyGetter<T> parent, PropertyFunction<? super T, ? extends R, ? super Exception> mapper,
2010                @Nullable PropertyFunction<? super R, ? extends String, ? super Exception> stringFunc)
2011                implements
2012                        ChildPropertyGetter<R> {
2013
2014        @Override
2015        public Result<R> get(LogProperties props, String key) {
2016                var result = parent.get(props, key);
2017                return switch (result) {
2018                        case Result.Success<T> s -> {
2019                                try {
2020                                        R r = mapper._apply(s.value());
2021                                        if (r == null) {
2022                                                yield PropertyGetter.findRoot(parent).missingResult(props, List.of(key));
2023                                        }
2024                                        yield new Result.Success<>(r);
2025                                }
2026                                catch (Exception e) {
2027                                        yield PropertyGetter.findRoot(parent).errorResult(props, key, e);
2028                                }
2029                        }
2030                        case Result.Error<T> e -> e.convert();
2031                        case Result.Missing<T> m -> m.convert();
2032                };
2033        }
2034
2035        @Override
2036        public String propertyString(R value) {
2037                var f = stringFunc;
2038                if (f != null) {
2039                        return stringFunc.apply(value);
2040                }
2041                return ChildPropertyGetter.super.propertyString(value);
2042        }
2043
2044}
2045
2046record RequiredFuncGetter<T, R>(RequiredPropertyGetter<T> parent,
2047                PropertyFunction<? super T, ? extends R, ? super Exception> mapper,
2048                @Nullable PropertyFunction<? super R, ? extends String, ? super Exception> stringFunc)
2049                implements
2050                        RequiredPropertyGetter<R> {
2051
2052        @Override
2053        public RequiredResult<R> get(LogProperties props, String key) {
2054                var result = parent.get(props, key);
2055                return switch (result) {
2056                        case Result.Success<T> s -> {
2057                                try {
2058                                        R r = mapper._apply(s.value());
2059                                        if (r == null) {
2060                                                throw new NullPointerException(
2061                                                                "The property function returned a null. props=" + props + ", key=" + key);
2062                                        }
2063                                        yield new Result.Success<>(r);
2064                                }
2065                                catch (Exception e) {
2066                                        yield PropertyGetter.findRoot(parent).errorResult(props, key, e);
2067                                }
2068                        }
2069                        case Result.Error<T> e -> e.convert();
2070                };
2071        }
2072
2073        @Override
2074        public String propertyString(R value) {
2075                var f = stringFunc;
2076                if (f != null) {
2077                        return stringFunc.apply(value);
2078                }
2079                return RequiredPropertyGetter.super.propertyString(value);
2080        }
2081
2082}
2083
2084interface ListLogProperties extends LogProperties {
2085
2086        @Override
2087        default @Nullable String valueOrNull(String key) {
2088                for (var props : properties()) {
2089                        var value = props.valueOrNull(key);
2090                        if (value != null) {
2091                                return value;
2092                        }
2093                }
2094                return null;
2095        }
2096
2097        default String description(String key) {
2098                StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
2099                boolean first = true;
2100                for (var p : properties()) {
2101                        if (first) {
2102                                first = false;
2103                        }
2104                        else {
2105                                sb.append(", ");
2106                        }
2107                        sb.append(p.description(key));
2108                }
2109                return sb.toString();
2110        }
2111
2112        LogProperties[] properties();
2113
2114        default StringBuilder toString(StringBuilder sb) {
2115                sb.append(getClass().getSimpleName());
2116                sb.append("[properties=").append(Arrays.deepToString(properties())).append("]");
2117                return sb;
2118        }
2119
2120}
2121
2122record CompositeMutableLogProperties(LogProperties[] properties) implements ListLogProperties, MutableLogProperties {
2123
2124        @Override
2125        public MutableLogProperties put(String key, @Nullable String value) {
2126                for (var p : properties()) {
2127                        if (p instanceof MutableLogProperties mp && mp != this) {
2128                                mp.put(key, value);
2129                        }
2130                }
2131                return this;
2132        }
2133
2134        public String toString() {
2135                return toString(new StringBuilder()).toString();
2136        }
2137
2138}
2139
2140record CompositeLogProperties(LogProperties[] properties) implements ListLogProperties {
2141        public String toString() {
2142                return toString(new StringBuilder()).toString();
2143        }
2144}
